projects.name: Supply Chain Negotiation Simulation (Undergraduate Research)
projects.description: Developing a web-based educational simulation that uses Generative AI agents to teach supply chain contracting and negotiation. Designed multi-player architecture, AI prompting framework for adaptive negotiation styles, and instructor analytics dashboard for performance tracking.

projects.name: ResearchPi
projects.description: AI-powered academic research analysis tool that collects papers from 5 academic databases (arXiv, PubMed, DOAJ, Zenodo, Crossref), extracts keywords using KeyBERT NLP, classifies research fields using DeepSeek R1 LLM, and generates structured researcher profiles.

projects.name: Citrus Notes Mobile
projects.description: Full-stack mobile app for note-taking and document management using Expo and FastAPI. Features document scanning, file management, and secure authentication, with MongoDB storage and OpenCV integration.

projects.name: RCPC Website Development
projects.description: Contributed to Rensselaer Competitive Programming Club's website using MERN stack, focusing on frontend development, UI/UX design, and open-source collaboration.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website (This Website)
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using Figma, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects, skills, and experiences.

projects.name: Object Detection with Region-based CNNs (RCNN)
projects.description: (Course Project) Implemented a region-based CNN for object detection using a modified ResNet-18 backbone, achieving strong accuracy in object classification and localization.

projects.name: Image Stitching and Panorama Creation with SIFT, RANSAC, and Homography
projects.description: (Course Project) Implemented image stitching and panorama creation using classical computer vision techniques including SIFT, RANSAC, and homography estimation.
